CustomField.formula: IF( BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode , '999'), '0', IF( AND(BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode , '2-03'),UnitPrice == 0 ), '3', IF( AND(BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode , '2-09'),UnitPrice == 0 ), '3', IF ( BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode , '1-5'), '2', IF ( BEGINS(Product2.ProductCode , '1'), '1', '0' ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: T&C Code
